extendedInfo.description: Introducing the P and F Sounboard Plus.  A Phineas and Ferb Soundboard! You get all the same great sounds and songs as in the free version (plus more) without ads and you get to save them as a ringtone or Notification. TO SAVE A RINGTONE/NOTIFICATION PLEASE PRESS AND HOLD THE SOUND.  then press save as, and then it will be saved in your ringtone lists, you have to manually set it to be your ringtone after that. These sounds are DOWNLOADED to your phone so you wont have issues with Lag that some some apps have when they stream the sounds to your phone!sounds include:Theme SongD.E.I JingleCurse you PerryYes, yes we areWhatcha DoooinGitchi Gitchi GooPerrys sound (nuganuganuga)Wheres Perry?Holiday theme songsSquirrels in my Pants And many more.....Just Added 10 new Songs and quotes on 5/28/13  Free version does not get these ;)I suggest you check out the free version before you buy this to see if you like it.DISCLAIMER: The Pictures associated with this app do not belong to the Disney Corporation.  They were obtained legally through 3rd parties.  The sounds you hear in this app are all publicly available for your listening pleasure on You tube.  We were not the ones to Upload them.  We just Provide a Different way for you to listen to them.   This app is not associated with Disney in anyway.This application complies with US Copyright law guidelines of "fair use". If you feel there is a direct copyright or trademark violation that doesn't follow within the "fair use" guidelines, please contact us directly.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Needs more but awesomely done Soundboard. And it includes Squirrels in My Pants.
reviews.author: Craig Jones

reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.comment: I\'m a big fan, so good that I can have watcha  doooooin as my msg notifyer, got all the kids at the school I work at quoting my phone lol!
reviews.author: A Google User
